newsitem.title: UAE: Cricket - New Zealand win toss, to field v Pakistan.
newsitem.headline: Cricket - New Zealand win toss, to field v Pakistan.

text.p: New Zealand won the toss and elected to field against Pakistan in the final of the Singer Champions Trophy cricket tournament on Friday.
New Zealand took to the field without their premier fast bowlers Danny Morrison and Simon Doull, who are nursing injuries.
Pakistan: Wasim Akram (captain), Saeed Anwar, Asmir Sohail, Shahid Afridi, Ijaz Ahmed, Salim Malik, Azam Khan, Moin Khan, Saqlain Mushtaq, Waqar Younis and Mushtaq Ahmed.
New Zealand: Lee Germon (captain), Bryan Young, Stephen Fleming, Adam Parore, Nathan Astle, Chris Cairns, Mark Greatbatch, Chris Harris, Dipak Patel, Gavin Larsen and Justin Vaughan.
Umpires: S.K. Bansal (India) and George Sharp (England). Third umpire Ian Robinson (Zimbabwe).
